content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace at position(-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position -15.0, -50.0) which is currently working with 2 coal and 4 iron ore, producing iron plates.
  
### Stone Furnace at position(-13.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position -13.0, -50.0) which is currently working with 3 coal and 4 iron ore, producing iron plates.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces without sufficient inventory
- Ensure you have enough iron ore in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the furnaces. The agent encountered this error multiple times when trying to insert iron ore into both furnaces.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
